name: Slash n' pack
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Axe: Q

Vacuum: E (Leftclick Suction / Rightclick Blow)

Use: Leftclick

Movement: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Pause: P

Created for Quarantinejam 2020
Created by: @PudzZe, @Bubbelss, @Norflip, @macmash

Gather all your beloved belongings and pack up your pickup truck
